VoiceMailContent.name: VoiceMailContent
VoiceMailContent.description: Represents a voicemail message left by a caller to the context user.

DurationInSeconds.description: The duration of the voicemail message in seconds.

FirstHeardDateTime.description: The time and date when the user first listened to the voicemail message.

MediaContentId.description: The ID of the related media content, a ContentDocument. The record counts toward your org’s file storage quota.

Name.description: The name of the voicemail message.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the voicemail message.

VoiceCallId.description: The ID of the related Dialer call.

VoiceMailContent.accessRules: As of Spring ’20 and later, only your Salesforce org's internal users can access this object.
